Reviews.Title: Better than what I had.
Reviews.Author: frank lopriore
Reviews.Content: I have a hearing problem and needed a phone I could hear ring. Trade-off was caller voice was not as good as previous Nokia. Also turned out to be red, not black. Overall, I'm happy as I've been meaning to switch to Consumer Cellular anyway, and the price was right on the phone.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic phone AND bargain
Reviews.Author: Mary H Ahrens
Reviews.Content: This phone and service are so dependable. The large letters and numbers are perfect for us seniors. You can't beat the rates, either!
